body_html: It's really easy to avoid codemod on this PR, can we do so and leave the codemod, e.g., for the weekend? Instead of replacing ATen/ArrayRef.h with ATen/core/ArrayRef.h, keep the old header and just have it #include <ATen/core/ArrayRef.h>. As you have just seen, you're going to get lots of conflicts if you bundle the codemod along with moving the files along, and you will probably keep conflicting with every PR until you land.

body: It's really easy to avoid codemod on this PR, can we do so and leave the codemod, e.g., for the weekend? Instead of replacing `ATen/ArrayRef.h` with `ATen/core/ArrayRef.h`, keep the old header and just have it `#include <ATen/core/ArrayRef.h>`. As you have just seen, you're going to get lots of conflicts if you bundle the codemod along with moving the files along, and you will probably keep conflicting with every PR until you land.
